Introduction
This topic contains information about arrested tuberculosis, including
processing
graduated ratings in effect on August 19, 1968
, and
ratings in effect after August 19, 1968
requesting examinations during the graduated rating period
, and
processing
notification of failure to follow treatment or submit to examination
, and
cases of irregular discharge
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B - Tuberculosis
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B
